page.title: 16LOCAL REMOVALS
page.content: George Copsey Company Limited is a removals,storage, packing and shipping company.They have a large detached house for their firm.They have been there for four years,although the company has been established since 1847. When they move people to different homes they are often from Collier Row to Romford and Chelmsford as well as other local places.They have moved peoples belongings as far away as Germany and South Africa.. The building has two floors,the ground floor area has a storage room and an office to let,and on the first floor there is an office,kitchen and toilet.
